title: Fresh tomato, basil and mozzarella pasta salad
ingredients: ['200g orzo pasta', '170g cubed fresh mozzarella cheese', '2 fresh plum tomatoes, seeded and cut into bite-size pieces', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon red chilli flakes', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed']
